input_text:
Job Title: Senior Network Engineer

Location: Dallas, TX

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Finance, Information Technology

Description:
Do you want to tackle the biggest questions in finance with near infinite compute power at your fingertips?
G-Research is a leading quantitative research and technology firm, with offices in London and Dallas. We are proud to employ some of the best people in their field and to nurture their talent in a dynamic, flexible and highly stimulating culture where world-beating ideas are cultivated and rewarded.
This is a hybrid role based in our new Dallas infrastructure hub where we work on the latest technologies in a cutting-edge environment.
The RoleOur Network Engineers work on key network automation, providing tier 3 support, including hybrid cloud implementations, data centre deployments and perimeter networks.
G-Research fosters a DevOps culture with a particular focus on automation; an understanding of the importance of building supportable solutions that reduce operational cost is therefore essential for this role.
We want engineers that can absorb new technologies, and have the ability to explain complex design structures to a range of users with varying technical knowledge.
Key responsibilities of the role include:Leading the development and integration of IAM solutions, aligning business needs with technical requirementsEngaging with stakeholders to understand challenges and requirements, providing expertise to solve complex IAM-related problemsImplementing and maintaining scalable, secure systems using a variety of technologies and productsDriving the adoption of automation, Infrastructure as Code, and CI/CD practices within the IAM domainContributing to the continuous improvement of our IAM processes, tooling, and practicesLeading efforts to instil SDLC best practices in the team to improve the developer experience of working with existing systems, ensuring that security is seamlessly integrated into the development process without compromising efficiency or productivity
Who are we looking for?The ideal candidate will have the following skills and experience:Experience designing and building highly scalable data centre networks, such as Cisco and AristaExperience configuring and troubleshooting network devices, including switches, routers and relevant experience troubleshootingExperience with WAN design, for example with ios-XR, SD-WAN, segment routing and multitenancyKnowledge of network routing and switching technologies, such as BGP, OSPF, EVPN and VXLANExperience with automation tools, such as Git, Python, Ansible and Jinja2
Why should you apply?Market-leading compensation plus annual discretionary bonusInformal dress code and excellent work/life balanceExcellent paid time off allowance of 25 daysSick days, military leave, and family and medical leaveGenerous 401(k) plan16-weeks' fully paid parental leaveMedical and Prescription, Dental, and Vision insuranceLife and Accidental Death & Dismemberment (AD&D) insuranceEmployee Assistance and Wellness programsGenerous relocation allowance and supportGreat selection of office snacks, and hot and cold drinksOn-site gym and car parking

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.title: Senior Network Engineer
output_json.summary: A Senior Network Engineer position at G-Research in Dallas, TX.
job_responsibilities: Leading the development and integration of IAM solutions
Engaging with stakeholders to understand challenges and requirements
Implementing and maintaining scalable, secure systems
Driving the adoption of automation, Infrastructure as Code, and CI/CD practices
Contributing to the continuous improvement of IAM processes, tooling, and practices
Leading efforts to instil SDLC best practices in the team
benefits: Market-leading compensation plus annual discretionary bonus
Informal dress code and excellent work/life balance
Excellent paid time off allowance of 25 days
Sick days, military leave, and family and medical leave
Medical and Prescription, Dental, and Vision insurance

Great selection of office snacks, and hot and cold drinks
output_json.company_information: G-Research is a leading quantitative research and technology firm, with offices in London and Dallas.
